review: I am enjoying our fire stick, but it does have some issues. At first I believed it was the Netflix app only, but I have issues with Hulu and YouTube. So far no issues with the Amazon shows and movies, but I have not used those as much as the other apps. Netflix continues to pause every few minutes sometimes, while other times I can watch for hours without a problem. I have had it completely crash twice - turning to a purple lined staticky screen, and had to reset the device. I did reinstall Netflix after a suggestion from the help forum but that has not fixed the issue. Lately Hulu has been randomly pausing as well, though no complete crashes. Netflix turned completely purple on me yesterday over the entire screen, but I could still hear voices talking. I had to turn the device off and restart it to fix it. I have purchased an extended (6') HDMI extender cable that I'm hoping will fix the issues if they are wifi related, but I'm not convinced that wifi signal is causing all of the crashing.In general though, when this is working, it's MUCH faster than my Smart TV downstairs. Navigation is easy and I like that it's very easy to sync all your Hulu, Netflix, etc accounts. The Youtube app is also much better than the one on my Smart TV. Very easy to scroll through your subscriptions. If it weren't always crashing I would absolutely give this 5 stars.
author: MWhittaker

review: It works great.  I get no jitter or issues over the WiFi, and the picture quality is excellent.  The remote works great and is easy to navigate around the screens.
author: Thomas Downey

review: I am so very pleased to not have to get up to tap the tablet to prevent it from going to sleep so whatever I'm watching doesn't get timed out. There is a lagging issue at times and the constant updates but this is a really good buy for me since I love binge watching everything.
author: Ty Walker

review: Does what they say it does. Nifty and convenient.
author: Phillip L.

review: As promised, it's very easy to set up. I am so pleased with my results (it was my first time setting up anything electronic) that I have bragging rights with all my friends!  I was enjoying my shows within 10 minutes!  Along with my kindle fire these are the best products I have ever seen.  Thank you for having my best interests in mind!
author: Orysmom

review: Absolutely love the Fire Stick! It's really easy to use and the kids love that they can play the games on the television when the grownups have the TV with the Playstation in use.
author: Kindle Customer "Amy F"

review: Love it! Low price, easy to get up and running, easy to use, and works just fine!
author: BENZEEL "Ben"

review: So far I like it but the reception is spotty even with the extender. During my shows its annoying. I would like to get fire TV however it's not available and I'm not sure why.
author: Brady

review: Very worth the investment. Many apps to choose from and movies to watch.
author: Erin

review: I'm not real impressed with the Fire Stick.  I have a Chromecast and actually prefer that.  I typically use my smartphone for Netflix and things like that and was looking forward to using the screen mirroring feature in order to display things from my phone on the TV.  The Mircast feature that the Fire Stick claims to handle that, hasn't worked for me.  Chromecast handles that feature much better.  Pretty disappointed!
author: Amazon Customer
